review_data.title: great Italian restaurant in Glattpark
review_data.content: We came to restaurant spontaneously without reservation but nevertheless got a very good table. Service, food and atmosphere were excellent! But in case i would recommend to reserve a table because the restaurant was fully complete Even on Monday evening.

review_data.title: Superb quality Sicilian cuisine
review_data.content: L'Unico is the new restaurant at the Kameha Grand Zurich that opened March 2015. The cuisine is Italian, specifically Sicilian. The chef Igino is passionate about his food and the quality is superb with many ingredients sourced from Sicily itself. The breads are very tasty...More
